title: Topic 001 Question 022
body: One of the developers on your team deployed their application in Google Container Engine with the Dockerfile below. They report that their application deployments are taking too long.
You want to optimize this Dockerfile for faster deployment times without adversely affecting the app's functionality.
Which two actions should you take? (Choose two.)
options: Use a slimmed-down base image like Alpine Linux
Use larger machine types for your Google Container Engine node pools
Copy the source after he package dependencies (Python and pip) are installed
